title: Money Monster
plot: Financial TV host Lee Gates and his producer Patty are put in an extreme situation when an irate investor takes them and their crew as hostage.

title: What Dreams May Come
plot: Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he discovers that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief over the loss, he embarks on an afterlife adventure to reunite with her.

title: Tom and Jerry
plot: The series features comic fights between an iconic pair of adversaries, a house cat (Tom) and a mouse (Jerry). The plots of each short usually center on Tom and Jerry's numerous attempts to...                 See full summary  »

title: Perfect Sense
plot: A chef and a scientist fall in love as an epidemic begins to rob people of their sensory perceptions.

title: Blood In, Blood Out
plot: Based on the true life experiences of poet Jimmy Santiago Baca, the film focuses on step-brothers Paco and Cruz, and their bi-racial cousin Miklo.

title: How It Ends
plot: In the midst of an apocalypse, a man struggles to reach his pregnant wife, who is thousands of miles away.

title: Better Than Us
plot: A family on the brink of splitting up become the owners of a cutting-edge robot being sought by a corporation, homicide investigators and terrorists.

title: Young Wallander
plot: Follow recently graduated police officer Kurt Wallander as he investigates his first case.

title: The Secret of My Success
plot: A talented young man can't get an executive position without rising through the ranks, so he comes up with a shortcut, which also benefits his love life.

title: The Handmaid's Tale
plot: Under a dystopian religious tyranny, most women cannot conceive children. Those young women who can live in a form of sexual slavery to provide children for influential families.

title: The Houseboat
plot: When celebrities Olli Schulz and Fynn Kliemann decided to buy and repurpose the old houseboat in which the German musician Gunter Gabriel lived up to his death, they didn't know for how much they signed up for.

title: Bloodsport
plot: "Bloodsport" follows  Frank Dux , an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.

title: Insight
plot: Jian (Ken Zheng) is a counter terrorism agent who blends his skills as a martial artist and clairvoyant to bring the world's most nefarious individuals to justice. This lone wolf is is ...                 See full summary  »

title: Michael Clayton
plot: A law firm brings in its "fixer" to remedy the situation after a lawyer has a breakdown while representing a chemical company that he knows is guilty in a multibillion-dollar class action suit.

title: Grindhouse
plot: Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez's homage to exploitation double features in the '60s and '70s with two back-to-back cult films that include previews of coming attractions between them.

title: Patriots Day
plot: The story of the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing and the aftermath, which includes the city-wide manhunt to find the terrorists responsible.

title: Best in Sex: 2017 AVN Awards
plot: Considered the industry's highest honor, the AVN Awards celebrates outstanding achievements in the world of adult entertainment in categories that recognize performers, directors, retailers...                 See full summary  »

title: The Aftermath
plot: Post World War II, a British colonel and his wife are assigned to live in Hamburg during the post-war reconstruction, but tensions arise with the German who previously owned the house.

title: Back to School
plot: To help his discouraged son get through college, a funloving and obnoxious rich businessman decides to enter the school as a student himself.

title: Bad Blood
plot: A dramatization of the life and death of Montreal mob boss Vito Rizzuto.

title: Red Riding Hood
plot: Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.

title: Arkansas
plot: Kyle and Swin live by the orders of an Arkansas-based drug kingpin named Frog, whom they've never met. But when a deal goes horribly wrong, the consequences are deadly.

title: Before Sunset
plot: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

title: Everybody Hates Chris
plot: A young African-American teen attempts to survive with his dysfunctional family and his all-white school in the 1980s.

title: Girlfriends' Guide to Divorce
plot: Follows a best-selling author of a self-help book series who hides her recent separation as she starts to navigate her life as a single woman in her 40s in Los Angeles.

title: Punch-Drunk Love
plot: A frustrated Barry Egan calls a phone-sex line to curb his loneliness. Little does he know that he will land in huge trouble and will also jeopardise his relationship with Lena.

title: Colonia
plot: A young woman's desperate search for her abducted boyfriend draws her into the infamous Colonia Dignidad, a sect nobody has ever escaped from.

title: Hightown
plot: Set in the world of beautiful but bleak Cape Cod, one woman's journey to sobriety is overshadowed by a murder investigation dragging her into its fold.

title: Star Wars: The Bad Batch
plot: The 'Bad Batch' of elite and experimental clones make their way through an ever-changing galaxy in the immediate aftermath of the Clone War.

title: Avenged
plot: A deaf girl is brutalized by a murderous gang who are then hunted by her when the bloodthirsty spirit of an Apache warrior inhabits her lifeless body.

title: 3 Days to Kill
plot: A dying CIA agent trying to reconnect with his estranged daughter is offered an experimental drug that could save his life in exchange for one last assignment.

title: The Transporter
plot: Frank Martin, who "transports" packages for unknown clients, is asked to move a package that soon begins moving, and complications arise.

title: To the Bone
plot: A young woman, dealing with anorexia, meets an unconventional doctor who challenges her to face her condition and embrace life.

title: The Rifleman
plot: The adventures of a Wild West rancher, wielding a customized rapid-fire Winchester rifle, and his son.

title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
plot: Showgirl Deloris Van Cartier returns as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of Catholic students whose run-down school is slated for closure.

title: The Omen
plot: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

title: Like Stars on Earth
plot: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

title: Poms
plot: POMS is a comedy about a group of women who form a cheer leading squad at their retirement community, proving that you're never too old to 'bring it!'

title: Kiki's Delivery Service
plot: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

title: SeaQuest 2032
plot: In the early 21st century, mankind has colonized the oceans. The United Earth Oceans Organization enlists Captain Nathan Bridger and the submarine seaQuest DSV to keep the peace and explore the last frontier on Earth.

title: A Fistful of Dollars
plot: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

title: An American Crime
plot: The true story of suburban housewife Gertrude Baniszewski, who kept a teenage girl locked in the basement of her Indiana home during the 1960s.

title: Return to the Blue Lagoon
plot: In this sequel to  The Blue Lagoon  (1980), two children are stranded on a beautiful island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together and eventually become suntanned teenagers in love.

title: Dumb and Dumber To
plot: 20 years since their first adventure, Lloyd and Harry go on a road trip to find Harry's newly discovered daughter, who was given up for adoption.

title: Sleepless in Seattle
plot: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

title: How to Be a Latin Lover
plot: Finding himself dumped after twenty-five years of marriage, a man who made a career of seducing rich older women must move in with his estranged sister, where he begins to learn the value of family.

title: Lock Up
plot: With only six months left of his sentence, inmate Frank Leone is transferred from a minimum security prison to a maximum security prison by a vindictive warden.

title: Fright Night
plot: When a nice new neighbor moves in next door, Charley discovers that he is an ancient vampire who preys on the community. Can he save his neighborhood from the creature with the help of the famous "vampire killer", Peter Vincent?

title: Bad Samaritan
plot: A pair of burglars stumble upon a woman being held captive in a home they intended to rob.

title: The New Adventures of Old Christine
plot: A divorced mom tries to keep pace with everyone around her.

title: Ed Wood
plot: Ambitious but troubled movie director  Edward D. Wood Jr.  tries his best to fulfill his dreams, despite his lack of talent.

title: Das Boot
plot: An inexperienced U-boat crew has to survive a secret mission and a young German woman is torn between loyalty for her home country and the French resistance in the WWII drama.

title: The Bucket List
plot: Two terminally ill men escape from a cancer ward and head off on a road trip with a wish list of to-dos before they die.

title: A Goofy Movie
plot: When Max makes a preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

title: Gossip Girl
plot: Reboot of the TV series centering on a new generation of New York private school teens using social media to spread gossip.

title: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
plot: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

title: Youth
plot: A retired orchestra conductor is on vacation with his daughter and his film director best friend in the Alps when he receives an invitation from Queen Elizabeth II to perform for Prince Philip's birthday.

title: Devil's Gate
plot: Seeking a missing woman in North Dakota, an FBI agent and a sheriff focus on her religious zealot husband but discover something far more sinister.

title: Horrible Bosses 2
plot: Dale, Kurt and Nick decide to start their own business but things don't go as planned because of a slick investor, prompting the trio to pull off a harebrained and misguided kidnapping scheme.

title: Babylon
plot: Plot unknown. Rumored to be set in period Hollywood.

title: Let the Right One In
plot: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

title: Mr. Sunshine
plot: A young boy who ends up in the U.S. after the 1871 Shinmiyangyo incident returns to Korea at a historical turning point and falls for a noblewoman.

title: Ravage
plot: Alone in the woods, nature photographer Harper witnesses a violent crime. After being captured by the culprits, she uses her survivalist skills to try and make it out alive.

title: Prime Cut
plot: A vicious Kansas City slaughterhouse owner and his hick family are having a bloody "beef" with the Chicago crime syndicate over profits from their joint illegal operations. Top enforcer Nick Devlin is sent to straighten things out.

title: The Pretender
plot: A specially gifted man, with the ability to instantly master any skill, escapes from a secret testing facility and travels the country taking on different jobs and helping strangers while hiding from his kidnappers.

title: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover
plot: At Le Hollandais gourmet restaurant, every night is filled with opulence, decadence, and gluttony. But when the cook, a thief, his wife and her lover all come together, they unleash a shocking torrent of sex, food, murder and revenge.

title: Blood of Zeus
plot: A commoner living in ancient Greece, Heron discovers his true heritage as a son of Zeus, and his purpose: to save the world from a demonic army.

title: Creepshow
plot: The fictional Creepshow comic books come to life in this anthology series of terrifying tales hosted by the silent Creepshow ghoul.

title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
plot: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

title: The Wall
plot: Two American Soldiers are trapped by a lethal sniper, with only an unsteady wall between them.

title: Frida
plot: A biography of artist  Frida Kahlo , who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.

title: Adore
plot: A pair of childhood friends and neighbors fall for each other's sons.

title: Vanity Fair
plot: An adaptation of the 1848 novel by William Makepeace Thackeray.

title: Terra Nova
plot: Centers on the Shannons, an ordinary family from 2149 when the planet is dying, who are transported back 85 million years to prehistoric Earth where they join Terra Nova, a colony of humans with a second chance to build a civilization.

title: Child 44
plot: A disgraced member of the Russian military police investigates a series of child murders during the Stalin-era Soviet Union.

title: Date Night
plot: In New York City, a case of mistaken identity turns a bored married couple's attempt at a glamorous and romantic evening into something more thrilling and dangerous.

title: The Six Million Dollar Man
plot: After a severely injured test pilot is rebuilt with nuclear-powered bionic limbs and implants, he serves as an intelligence agent.

title: Memoirs of a Geisha
plot: Nitta Sayuri reveals how she transcended her fishing-village roots and became one of Japan's most celebrated geisha.

title: Near Dark
plot: A small-town farmer's son reluctantly joins a traveling group of vampires after he is bitten by a beautiful drifter.

title: Cinderella Man
plot: The story of James J. Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to challenge for the heavyweight championship of the world.

title: Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising
plot: When their new next-door neighbors turn out to be a sorority even more debaucherous than the fraternity previously living there, Mac and Kelly team with their former enemy, Teddy, to bring the girls down.

title: Stick It
plot: After a run-in with the law, Haley Graham ( Missy Peregrym ) is forced to return to the world from which she fled some years ago. Enrolled in an elite gymnastics program run by the legendary Burt Vickerman ( Jeff Bridges ), Haley's rebellious attitude gives way to something that just might be called team spirit.

title: Blade
plot: Plot is unknown at this time.

title: Crimson Tide
plot: On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger happy Captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.

title: Horse Girl
plot: Sarah, a socially isolated woman with a fondness for arts and crafts, horses, and supernatural crime shows finds her increasingly lucid dreams trickling into her waking life.

title: Beirut
plot: Caught in the crossfires of civil war, CIA operatives must send a former U.S. diplomat to negotiate for the life of a friend he left behind.

title: Demolition
plot: A successful investment banker struggles after losing his wife in a tragic car crash. With the help of a customer service rep and her young son, he starts to rebuild, beginning with the demolition of the life he once knew.

title: Concussion
plot: In Pittsburgh, accomplished pathologist Dr. Bennet Omalu uncovers the truth about brain damage in football players who suffer repeated concussions in the course of normal play.

title: One Hour Photo
plot: A mentally unstable photo developer targets a middle-class family after his obsession with them becomes more sick and disturbing than any of them could imagine.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
plot: Sequel to the 2020 live-action feature film 'Sonic the Hedgehog'.

title: American Pie 2
plot: Jim and his friends are now in college, and they decide to meet up at the beach house for some fun.

title: UFO
plot: The missions of the Supreme Headquarters Alien Defence Organization, which defends Earth from extra-terrestrial threats.

title: Executive Decision
plot: When terrorists seize control of an airliner, an intelligence analyst accompanies a commando unit for a midair boarding operation.

title: The Ridiculous 6
plot: An outlaw who was raised by Native Americans discovers that he has five half-brothers. Together the men go on a mission to find their wayward, deadbeat dad.

title: A Most Violent Year
plot: In New York City 1981, an ambitious immigrant fights to protect his business and family during the most dangerous year in the city's history.

title: Absolutely Fabulous
plot: The wild misadventures of Edina "Eddy" Monsoon and her best friend Patsy Stone, who live in a nearly constant haze of drugged, drunken selfishness.

title: Samurai Jack
plot: A samurai sent through time fights to return home and save the world.

title: Shrill
plot: A woman seeks out ways to change her life without changing her body.

title: Vivo
plot: Vivo, Sony Pictures Animation's first-ever musical adventure featuring all-new original songs from Lin-Manuel Miranda, will take audiences on an epic adventure to gorgeous and vibrant locations never before seen in animation.

title: Swingers
plot: A wannabe actor has a hard time moving on from a break-up, but he is lucky to have supportive friends.

title: The Wild Wild West
plot: Two Secret Service Agents, equipped with a wide array of gizmos, work for the government in the Old West.

title: Evolution
plot: A fire-fighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky but sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.

title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
plot: Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.

title: Paddington 2
plot: Paddington (Ben Whishaw), now happily settled with the Brown family and a popular member of the local community, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy's (Imelda Staunton's) 100th birthday, only for the gift to be stolen.

title: Untitled Paul Thomas Anderson Project
plot: Set in 1970s San Fernando Valley, the film follows a high school student, who is also a successful child actor.

title: Silver Spoons
plot: Ricky Stratton is a spoiled rich kid who lives the life that many kids dream of, but he still suffers from the problems that many teens do.

title: I Saw the Light
plot: The story of the country-western singer  Hank Williams , who in his brief life created one of the greatest bodies of work in American music. The film chronicles his rise to fame and its tragic effect on his health and personal life.

title: Take Shelter
plot: Plagued by a series of apocalyptic visions, a young husband and father questions whether to shelter his family from a coming storm, or from himself.

title: Dark Shadows
plot: The rich Collins family of Collinsport, Maine is tormented by strange occurrences.

title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
plot: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freya's army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna.

title: The Man from Earth
plot: An impromptu goodbye party for Professor John Oldman becomes a mysterious interrogation after the retiring scholar reveals to his colleagues he has a longer and stranger past than they can imagine.

title: The New World
plot: The story of the English exploration of Virginia, and of the changing world and loves of Pocahontas.

title: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
plot: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

title: Spirit Untamed
plot: Lucky Prescott's life is changed forever when she move from her home in the city to a small frontier town and befriends a wild mustang named Spirit.

title: Winter's Bone
plot: An unflinching Ozark Mountain girl hacks through dangerous social terrain as she hunts down her drug-dealing father while trying to keep her family intact.

title: Becker
plot: Dr. John Becker goes through his daily routine of being a doctor, stopping at his favorite diner, and other various situations, all the while hating life and everything around him.

title: 40 Days and 40 Nights
plot: After a brutal break-up, a young man vows to stay celibate during the forty days of Lent, but finds the girl of his dreams and is unable to do anything about it.

title: Shaft
plot: JJ Shaft, a cyber security expert with a degree from MIT, enlists his family's help to uncover the truth behind his best friend's untimely death.

title: Leatherface
plot: A teenage Leatherface escapes from a mental hospital with three other inmates, kidnapping a young nurse and taking her on a road trip from hell, while being pursued by a lawman out for revenge.

title: The Doorman
plot: A woman returns from combat and befriends a family in NYC. A gang of thieves plot to take the family's valuables, and she is all that stands between them and their lives.

title: ALF
plot: A furry alien wiseguy comes to live with the Tanner family after crashing into their garage.

title: Kidding
plot: Jeff, a famous children's television icon, struggles to retain his sanity as his family falls apart.

title: The Jeffersons
plot: A nouveau riche, African-American family who move into a luxury apartment building develop close, if occasionally fractious, relationships with other tenants.

title: Warlock
plot: A warlock flees from the 17th to the 20th century, with a witch-hunter in hot pursuit.

title: Prom Night
plot: Donna's senior prom is supposed to be the best night of her life, though a sadistic killer from her past has different plans for her and her friends.

title: The Powerpuff Girls
plot: Three super-powered little girls constantly save the world (or at least the city of Townsville) from monsters, would-be conquerers and a few other gross things.

title: Chemical Hearts
plot: A high school transfer student finds a new passion when she begins to work on the school's newspaper.

title: The Siege of Jadotville
plot: Irish Commandant Pat Quinlan leads a stand off with troops against French and Belgian Mercenaries in the Congo during the early 1960s.

title: Everybody Wants Some!!
plot: In 1980, a group of college baseball players navigate their way through the freedoms and responsibilities of unsupervised adulthood.

title: The Thick of It
plot: Set in the corridors of power and spin, the Minister for Social Affairs is continually harassed by Number 10's policy enforcer and dependent on his not-so-reliable team of civil servants.

title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
plot: High schooler Greg, who spends most of his time making parodies of classic movies with his co-worker Earl, finds his outlook forever altered after befriending a classmate who has just been diagnosed with cancer.

title: A River Runs Through It
plot: The story about two sons of a stern minister -- one reserved, one rebellious -- growing up in rural Montana while devoted to fly fishing.

title: Killing Me Softly
plot: A woman faces deadly consequences for abandoning her loving relationship with her boyfriend to pursue exciting sexual scenarios with a mysterious celebrity mountaineer.

title: The Way West
plot: In 1843, a former U.S. Senator leads a wagon train of settlers to Oregon, but his megalomania leads to growing dissatisfaction with his leadership.

title: Pan
plot: Twelve-year-old orphan Peter is spirited away to the magical world of Neverland, where he finds both fun and danger, and ultimately discovers his destiny -- to become the hero who will be for ever known as Peter Pan.

title: Jane Eyre
plot: A mousy governess who softens the heart of her employer soon discovers that he's hiding a terrible secret.

title: A Private War
plot: One of the most celebrated war correspondents of our time, Marie Colvin is an utterly fearless and rebellious spirit, driven to the frontline of conflicts across the globe to give voice to the voiceless.

title: Gold Digger
plot: A wealthy older woman falls in love with a younger man, but is the relationship all that it seems?

title: Hot Summer Nights
plot: In the summer of 1991, a sheltered teenage boy comes of age during a wild summer he spends on Cape Cod getting rich from selling pot to gangsters, falling in love for the first time, partying and eventually realizing that he is in over his head.

title: Gold Rush
plot: A reality TV show that follows crews mining the gold placer deposits of the Yukon Territory.

title: Set It Up
plot: Two corporate executive assistants hatch a plan to match-make their two bosses.

title: The Thundermans
plot: These siblings with superpowers might be twins, but they are very different indeed.

title: Dumplin'
plot: Willowdean ('Dumplin'), the plus-size teenage daughter of a former beauty queen, signs up for her mom's Miss Teen Bluebonnet pageant as a protest that escalates when other contestants follow her footsteps, revolutionizing the pageant and their small Texas town.

title: Seberg
plot: Inspired by real events in the life of French New Wave icon  Jean Seberg . In the late 1960s, Hoover's FBI targeted her because of her political and romantic involvement with civil rights activist Hakim Jamal.

title: The Cider House Rules
plot: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

title: Prince of Darkness
plot: A group of graduate students and scientists uncover an ancient canister in an abandoned church, but when they open the container, they inadvertently unleash a strange liquid and an evil force on all humanity.

title: Fright Night
plot: A teenager discovers that the newcomer in his neighborhood is a vampire, so he turns to an actor in a television horror show for help dealing with the undead.

title: Justice League Dark: Apokolips War
plot: A Sequel to Justice League Dark (2017) involving Jack Kirby's New Gods.

title: The Secret Life of Pets
plot: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.

title: The Big Hit
plot: Socially anxious hitman Melvin Smiley, an expert in his lucrative field, goes on a job and falls in love with his kidnapping victim, turning his world upside down.

title: Berlin Station
plot: Follows a CIA team in Berlin and their clandestine activities.

title: The Half of It
plot: When smart but cash-strapped teen Ellie Chu agrees to write a love letter for a jock, she doesn't expect to become his friend - or fall for his crush.

title: Outbreak
plot: Army doctors struggle to find a cure for a deadly virus spreading throughout a California town that was brought to America by an African monkey.

title: Sneakers
plot: A security pro finds his past coming back to haunt him, when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.

title: Changeling
plot: Grief-stricken mother Christine Collins (Angelina Jolie) takes on the L.A.P.D. to her own detriment when it tries to pass off an obvious impostor as her missing child.

title: Whitechapel
plot: A fast-tracked inspector, a hardened detective sergeant, and an expert in historical homicides investigate modern crimes with connections to the past in the Whitechapel district of London.

title: The Darkest Minds
plot: Imprisoned by an adult world that now fears everyone under 18, a group of teens form a resistance group to fight back and reclaim control of their future.

title: Feel the Beat
plot: After failing to find success on Broadway, April returns to her hometown and reluctantly is recruited to train a misfit group of young dancers for a big competition.

title: Holby City
plot: The everyday lives, professional and personal, of the doctors, nurses and patients who find themselves, for various reasons, in the wards of the frenetic cardiac unit of Holby City General Hospital.

title: Not Going Out
plot: The mishaps of slacker Lee, Lee's best mate Tim, Lee's long-suffering landlady and the love of Lee's life, Lucy, and Tim's well-meaning but dim-witted girlfriend Daisy.

title: House at the End of the Street
plot: After moving with her mother to a small town, a teenager finds that an accident happened in the house at the end of the street. Things get more complicated when she befriends a boy. A double murder is not an accident.

title: Child's Play
plot: A mother gives her 13-year-old son a toy doll for his birthday, unaware of its more sinister nature.

title: Sliders
plot: A boy genius and his comrades travel to different parallel universes, trying to find their way back home.

title: LazyTown
plot: In this Nick Jr. television show, a pink-haired girl named Stephanie moves to LazyTown with her uncle (the mayor of LazyTown), where she tries to teach its extremely lazy residents that physical activity is beneficial.

title: The Artist
plot: An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.

title: Miss Bala
plot: Gloria finds a power she never knew she had when she is drawn into a dangerous world of cross-border crime. Surviving will require all of her cunning, inventiveness, and strength. Based on the Spanish-language film.

title: Wild Card
plot: When a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal skills and a gambling problem gets in trouble with the mob, he has one last play...and it's all or nothing.

title: Robin Hood
plot: The story of the legendary British outlaw is portrayed with the characters as humanoid animals.

title: Santa Fe Trail
plot: In 1854, Jeb Stuart, George Custer and other graduates from West Point are posted to Kansas to help pacify the territory before railroad construction to Santa Fe can resume.

title: Audition
plot: A widower takes an offer to screen girls at a special audition, arranged for him by a friend to find him a new wife. The one he fancies is not who she appears to be after all.

title: Insidious: The Last Key
plot: Parapsychologist Dr. Elise Rainier faces her most fearsome and personal haunting yet, as she is drawn back to her ghostly childhood home, where the terror began.

title: Countdown
plot: When a nurse downloads an app that claims to predict the moment a person will die, it tells her she only has three days to live. With the clock ticking and a figure haunting her, she must find a way to save her life before time runs out.

title: Three Men and a Baby
plot: Three bachelors find themselves forced to take care of a baby left by one of the guys' girlfriends.

title: Dead Man Walking
plot: A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.

title: Running with the Devil
plot: The CEO of an international conglomerate sends two of his most regarded executives to investigate why shipments of cocaine are being hijacked and over cut somewhere on the supply chain.

title: The Unit
plot: Hour long show which looks at the life of American super-secret operators.

title: Downsizing
plot: A social satire in which a man realizes he would have a better life if he were to shrink himself to five inches tall, allowing him to live in wealth and splendor.

title: Serpico
plot: An honest New York cop named  Frank Serpico  blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

title: The Taking of Deborah Logan
plot: An elderly woman battling Alzheimer's disease agrees to let a film crew document her condition, but what they discover is something far more sinister going on.

title: Border
plot: A customs officer who can smell fear develops an unusual attraction to a strange traveler while aiding a police investigation which will call into question her entire existence.

title: Death to 2020
plot: Take a look back at the mad glory of the year 2020 in this comedic retrospective.

title: In Plain Sight
plot: U.S. Marshal Mary Shannon must hunt down witnesses for federal cases in the witness protection program while also managing a rather dysfunctional family and her own personal life.

title: Brother Bear
plot: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

title: Definitely, Maybe
plot: A political consultant tries to explain his impending divorce and past relationships to his 11-year-old daughter.

title: Deliver Us from Evil
plot: New York police officer Ralph Sarchie investigates a series of crimes. He joins forces with an unconventional priest, schooled in the rites of exorcism, to combat the possessions that are terrorizing their city.

title: Twilight Zone: The Movie
plot: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from  Rod Serling 's landmark television series.

title: The Rising Hawk
plot: The Mongol Empire had grown to the largest the world had ever known. It's armies now laid siege to much of Eastern Europe. A small village fights for freedom in the frontier landscape of the Carpathian Mountains.

title: October Sky
plot: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

title: Teenage Bounty Hunters
plot: After joining forces with a veteran bounty hunter, sixteen-year-old fraternal twin sisters Sterling and Blair dive into the world of bail skipping baddies while still navigating the high stakes of teenage life.

title: Vikings: Valhalla
plot: Follow-up series to 'Vikings' set 100 years afterward and centering on the adventures of Leif Erikson, Freydis, Harald Hardrada and the Norman King William the Conqueror.

title: Convoy
plot: Truckers form a mile long "convoy" in support of a trucker's vendetta with an abusive sheriff...Based on the country song of same title by C.W. McCall.

title: Code 8
plot: A super-powered construction worker falls in with a group of criminals in order to raise the funds to help his ill mother.

title: The Inspector Lynley Mysteries
plot: British crime investigation series based around aristocratic, Oxford-educated Detective Inspector Thomas Lynley (  Nathaniel Parker  ) and his working-class assistant Sergeant Barbara Havers (  Sharon Small  ).

title: The Royals
plot: Drama about a fictional British royal family in modern-day London.

title: The Hot Spot
plot: Upon arriving to a small town, a drifter quickly gets into trouble with the local authorities - and the local women - after he robs a bank.

title: Scissors
plot: A woman trying to recover from a sexual attack is locked in a posh apartment with a corpse of the very man she's been dreaming would murder her. She tries to hang on to reality when objects around her seem to come to life.

title: Crown Vic
plot: Follows one memorable night in the life of LAPD officer Ray Mandel while hunting two cop killers on the loose.

title: Wildlife
plot: A teenage boy must deal with his mother's complicated response after his father temporarily abandons them to take a menial and dangerous job.

title: Pixels
plot: When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games.

title: The Dead Zone
plot: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

title: Hannah and Her Sisters
plot: Between two Thanksgivings two years apart, Hannah's husband falls in love with her sister Lee, while her hypochondriac ex-husband rekindles his relationship with her sister Holly.

title: Secret Window
plot: A successful writer in the midst of a painful divorce is stalked at his remote lake house by a would-be scribe who accuses him of plagiarism.

title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
plot: Alice wakes up in the Raccoon City hospital after the area has been overrun by zombies, and must now make it out of the city before a nuclear bomb is dropped.

title: Rebel Without a Cause
plot: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

title: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
plot: Now settled in Genovia, Princess Mia faces a new revelation: she is being primed for an arranged marriage to an English suitor.

title: The Outer Limits
plot: A modern revival of the classic science fiction horror anthology show  The Outer Limits  (1963). Episodes often have twist-endings and involve aliens. Sometimes, a story from one episode continues in a later episode.

title: The Grudge
plot: A house is cursed by a vengeful ghost that dooms those who enter it with a violent death.

title: It Comes at Night
plot: Secure within a desolate home as an unnatural threat terrorizes the world, a man has established a tenuous domestic order with his wife and son. Then a desperate young family arrives seeking refuge.

title: The Man with the Iron Heart
plot: As the German Fascists expand their borders, scorching Europe from end to end, two brave Czechs of the Resistance prepare for a suicide mission to assassinate  Reinhard Heydrich , the hideous mastermind behind the "Final Solution".

title: A Monster Calls
plot: A boy seeks the help of a tree monster to cope with his single mother's terminal illness.

title: Alive
plot: A Uruguayan rugby team stranded in the snow swept Andes are forced to use desperate measures to survive after a plane crash.

title: After the Wedding
plot: A manager of an orphanage in India is sent to Copenhagen, Denmark, where he discovers a life-altering family secret.

title: The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind
plot: Against all the odds, a thirteen-year-old boy in Malawi invents an unconventional way to save his family and village from famine.

title: Breach
plot: FBI upstart Eric O'Neill enters into a power game with his boss, Robert Hanssen, an agent who was put on trial for selling secrets to the Soviet Union.

title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
plot: The flightless birds and scheming green pigs take their feud to the next level.

title: Brimstone
plot: From the moment the new reverend climbs the pulpit, Liz knows she and her family are in great danger.

title: Itaewon Class
plot: The story of Park Sae Ro Yi who opens a restaurant in Itaewon.

title: 30 Minutes or Less
plot: Two fledgling criminals kidnap a pizza delivery guy, strap a bomb to his chest, and inform him that he has mere hours to rob a bank or else...

title: Sleeping Beauty
plot: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.

title: Space: 1999
plot: The crew of Moonbase Alpha must struggle to survive when a massive explosion throws the Moon from orbit into deep space.

title: A Confession
plot: Detective Superintendent Steve Fulcher intends on catching a killer of a missing woman, even if that may cost him his career and reputation.

title: The Exception
plot: A German soldier tries to determine if the Dutch resistance has planted a spy to infiltrate the home of Kaiser Wilhelm in Holland during the onset of World War II, but falls for a young Jewish Dutch woman during his investigation.

title: Good Luck Chuck
plot: In order to keep the woman of his dreams from falling for another guy, Charlie Logan has to break the curse that has made him wildly popular with single women: Sleep with Charlie once, and the next man you meet will be your true love.

title: Untitled Indiana Jones Project
plot: The plot is unknown at this time.

title: Drive Angry
plot: A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.

title: Resistance
plot: The story of mime  Marcel Marceau  as he works with a group of Jewish boy scouts and the French Resistance to save the lives of ten thousand orphans during World War II.

title: American Dragon: Jake Long
plot: A teenage slacker is given the ability to turn into the American Dragon and defends all mythical creatures that secretly reside in the human world.

title: American Murder: The Family Next Door
plot: In 2018, 34-year-old Shanann Watts and her two young daughters disappear in Colorado. With the heartbreaking details emerging, the family's story made headlines around the world.

title: The Kissing Booth 2
plot: In the sequel to 2018's THE KISSING BOOTH, high school senior Elle juggles a long-distance relationship with her dreamy boyfriend Noah, college applications, and a new friendship with a handsome classmate that could change everything.

title: The 39 Steps
plot: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage Agent. But when the Agent is killed, and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring which is trying to steal top secret information.

title: Mozart in the Jungle
plot: Love, money, ambition and music intertwine in Mozart in the Jungle, a half hour comedic drama that looks at finding yourself and finding love while conquering New York City. A brash new maestro Rodrigo stirs up the New York Symphony as young oboist Hailey hopes for her big chance.

title: The Guardian
plot: Nick Fallin is a hotshot lawyer working at his father's ultrasuccessful Pittsburgh law firm. Unfortunately, the high life has gotten the best of Nick.

title: The Collector
plot: Desperate to repay his debt to his ex-wife, an ex-con plots a heist at his new employer's country home, unaware that a second criminal has also targeted the property, and rigged it with a series of deadly traps.

title: The Body
plot: A detective searches for the body of a femme fatale which has gone missing from a morgue.

title: Scary Movie 2
plot: Four teens are tricked by Professor Oldman (Tim Curry) into visiting a haunted house for a school project.

title: What Lies Beneath
plot: The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind.

title: Shoplifters
plot: A family of small-time crooks take in a child they find outside in the cold.

title: Any Which Way You Can
plot: A trucker turned prize fighter, his brother and their pet orangutan have a series of misadventures involving the mob, corrupt cops, motorcycle gangs and pretty dames.
A man who specialises in debunking paranormal occurrences checks into the fabled room 1408 in the Dolphin Hotel. Soon after settling in, he confronts genuine terror.

title: The Iron Giant
plot: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

title: The Cry
plot: Nominated for an International Emmy® for Best Actress, Jenna Coleman (Victoria, Doctor Who) mesmerizes as young mother Joanna in this intense psychological thriller.

title: Undone
plot: A woman discovers she has a new relationship with time after surviving a car accident that almost killed her.

title: Damnation
plot: An epic saga about the secret history of the 1930s American heartland, centering on the mythic conflict and bloody struggle between big money and the downtrodden.

title: Deep Rising
plot: A group of heavily armed hijackers board a luxury ocean liner in the South Pacific Ocean to loot it, only to do battle with a series of large-sized, tentacled, man-eating sea creatures who had already invaded the ship.

title: The Wretched
plot: A defiant teenage boy, struggling with his parents' imminent divorce, faces off with a thousand year-old witch, who is living beneath the skin of and posing as the woman next door.

title: Clerks
plot: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

title: The Pale Blue Eye
plot: Follows a veteran detective who investigates the murders, helped by a detail-oriented young cadet who will later become a world famous author, Edgar Allan Poe.

title: The Outsider
plot: An epic set in post-WWII Japan and centered on an American former G.I. who joins the yakuza.

title: The Poseidon Adventure
plot: Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.

title: Mouse
plot: A suspenseful story that will center around the key question, "What if we could sort out psychopaths in advance?"
